background: Directs Prima’s factual and reality slate with a focus on commercial appeal. Commissions true crime, human interest and returnable factual formats for mainstream audiences.
content_not_wanted: Overly niche/arthouse projects with limited commercial appeal
Content lacking episodic structure or broad resonance
target_audience: Czech mainstream viewers seeking entertainment factual
technical_requirements: Clear episodic/format bible for returnable shows
current_calls: True crime formats with Czech setting
name: Lenka Hornová
